description:
All welcome to join us for our annual Christmas Data Beers\* social.

UPDATE: Pleased to announce that our buddies at PyData are now co-organising this social with us! :)

At the Phoenix (between Cabot Circus and Old Market next to Future Inn hotel), we have a reservation in their outside area (covered and heated!) and will keep an eye out for indoor space becoming available.

They should be serving food so anyone planning to get dinner while out should be able to do so.

Please note that this is an informal social with no speakers.

\*Beer drinking not mandatory, we pick venues with a reasonable range of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages!
title: Christmas Data Beers
